bibl.title: Capitatio and Iugatio.
A.H.M. Jones, The Roman Economy. Studies in Ancient Economic and Administrative History
bibl.author: Jones, A.H.M.

bibl.note: Reproduit de: JRS 47 (1957) pp. 88-94. - See in part. pp. 288-290: "There were certain areas of the Empire, including certainly Egypt, where the combined system of capitatio and iugatio was not applied."
A.H.M. Jones, The Roman Economy. Studies in Ancient Economic and Administrative History (Oxford, 1974) pp. 280-292.
